reuze

Class cc_RunLength

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.cc_RunLength

  • public class cc_RunLength
extends java.lang.Object
    Compilation: javac RunLength.java Execution: java RunLength - < input.txt (compress) Execution: java RunLength + < input.txt (expand) Dependencies: BinaryIn.java BinaryOut.java Compress or expand binary input from standard input using run-length encoding. % java BinaryDump 40 < 4runs.bin 0000000000000001111111000000011111111111 40 bits This has runs of 15 0s, 7 1s, 7 0s, and 11 1s. % java RunLength - < 4runs.bin | java HexDump 0f 07 07 0b 4 bytes
